div.p: RHINANTHUS, in botany: A genus of the angioſpermia order, belonging to the didynamia claſs of plants ; and in the natural method ranking under the 40th order, Perfonatœ. The calyx is quadriſid, and ventricoſe ; the capſule bilocular, obtuſe, and compressed.
